data.title: Hitler - Memoirs of a Confidant
data.meta_description: Super octavo, illus light card covers, black lettering to spine, xxvi + 333pp, illus/photos, VG (light creasing & curling to spine & covers, moderate fading to spine, light foxing & soiling to page edges, light cracking to front gutter, some light to moderate underlining to text in ink)
data.text:
Description:

Super octavo, illus light card covers, black lettering to spine, xxvi + 333pp, illus/photos, VG (light creasing & curling to spine & covers, moderate fading to spine, light foxing & soiling to page edges, light cracking to front gutter, some light to moderate underlining to text in ink)
